text: In this American English Pronunciation video,
we're going to see the results of the challenge A Beautiful Spot in your Home Country.
Two weeks ago, I asked you to send me videos
practicing your English.
I asked you to describe a beautiful place in your home country.
And you guys did it and guess what happened to me?
I got the travel bug.
You guys did such a great job showing me the beautiful places in your home countries.
Now, I want to go and visit all of them and visit all of you!
Unfortunately, I can't do that.
But that's why it's so wonderful that you made these videos for me.
You showed me new places that i've never been to,
many of which I will never get to see.
So I'm so glad that you gave me a little glimpse.
We're going to see of those videos in a minute.
But first, if you missed this challenge, if you didn't know it was going to happen,
be sure to sign up for my mailing list.
rachelsenglish.com/newsletter
You'll get an email every week with the latest video
and if I'm ever doing something like a challenge, you'll be sure to hear about it.
Okay guys, without further ado, all of the beautiful spots in your countries.
